name: Antimatter (Beta)
description:
This is "Antimatter", my entry for the TriJam 145 made in 2h10 with Unity.

CONTROLS

Left/Right click: Change Player to Color 1 or to Color 2

Collect the right particles with the right Colors (Use Left and Right click to adapt), survive for as long as possible and beat your highscore!

How long will you handle Antimatter ?

HOW I MADE THE GAME
